EmailTemplate.name: ShipperHQ Survey (GTM-1190).Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: We want your feedback on ShipperHQ
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As we work on new features, we like to reach out to customers to get their thoughts. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for recently trying out BigCommerce’s integration with ShipperHQ. To help us continue to improve our service, we’d like to ask you a few short questions about your experience. This survey should take less than 5 minutes to complete.
TAKE THE SHORT SURVEY <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CYVQNXY]]> Thanks,
Jordan Sim Product Management
